questions.the question: What is the height of a node?
choices: The number of leaf nodes of the tree
The number of edges in the shortest path from that node to a leaf node
The number of edges in the longest path from that node to a leaf node
The number of edges from that node to a root node

questions.the question: What is the difference between a Stack and a Queue?
choices: Stack is LIFO(Last in First out) while Queue is FIFO(First in First out)
Stack is FIFO(First in First out) while Queue is LIFO(Last in First out)
Stack is implemented using a Queue

choices: Comparing elements from the unsorted part of the array to elements in the sorted part
Swapping elements to determine to correct order

What is the min heap property?

questions.the question: Which of the following is NOT a valid approach when dealing with an Open Addressing Hash Table?

choices: A method with the same name as a different one but differs in the parameters type or number.
A method that overrides a certain method from a superclass
A method the subclass inherits from the superclass
